rotateVector

public static Vector3f rotateVector(Vector3f v,
                                    Quaternion q)
Rotates a vector around a specified quaternion

Parameters:
v - Vector3f to rotate
q - Quaternion about which to rotate v
Returns:
the Vector3f (v) as rotated around q

rotateVector

public static Vector3f rotateVector(Vector3f v,
                                    float angle,
                                    Vector3f aboutAxis)
Rotates a vector by some angle around some axis and returns the new vector

Parameters:
v - the vector to be rotated
angle - how many degrees to rotate the vector
aboutAxis - the UNIT vector representing which axis to rotate this vector on
Returns:
a new vector of same length as v, which has been rotated around Axis
